extension.news: v.0.3.0 - added additional font choices - made Arial the default font - all non-clock interfaces use Arial for readability
extension.summary: A skin that turns Kodi into a simple weather clock
extension.description: A skin designed to be used on a touchscreen device like the Raspberry Pi with touchscreen that converts Kodi into a simple weather clock. This is a HEAVILY modified and stripped down version of Estouchy.
